CustomField.description: This field can be used to direct process issues to an external resource such as the customer's service provider. The search should be an alert triggered by a change in this field where the result does not equal the default value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Completing this field sends a message to FLO or your Salesforce consultant detailing the issue and providing them with access to your relevant process record.
CustomField.label: Request Process Help
